# Deep Slumber (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 3]], [[3rd Level Bard Spells|Bard 3]], [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 5]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S, M (fine sand, rose petals, or a live cricket)

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Area:** One or more living creatures within a 10-ft.-radius burst

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 265

This spell functions like *[[Sleep (Spell)|sleep]],* except that it affects 10 HD of targets.

**GM Note** 

*House Rule:* Added Assassin 3 to Level per *Dungeon Master's Guide*.
